title: Learning Style-Based Customized Language Leadership Course: Text·Expression·Reading Comprehension Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education management experience and curriculum design capabilities, basic grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate elementary language education administrators, conducted in digital device-utilizing environments. Focuses on enhancing learners' text analysis skills and expressive techniques

learning_goals: Analyze participants’ individual language learning preferences (reading, writing, speaking) with over 80% accuracy using a learning style diagnostic tool.

Learners can establish three types of language education operation plans for learners over 40 in corporate settings (classified by visual, auditory, kinesthetic types) within one week, each including at least two customized activities (e.g., visual: infographic-based vocabulary learning; auditory: podcast listening analysis; kinesthetic: role-play expression training).
Achieve the ability to design style-based language tasks and provide feedback in blended classes, including grammar structure analysis, text interpretation, and expression fluency evaluation.
Confirm achievement of 4.0/5.0 or higher in learner satisfaction evaluations, measuring improvements in reading comprehension, expressive skills, and vocabulary expansion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
